verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* the \w collection|strong="G3048"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*, \w as|strong="G5618"\w* I have given \w order|strong="G1299"\w* to the \w churches|strong="G1577"\w* of \w Galatia|strong="G1053"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w Upon|strong="G2596"\w* the \w first|strong="G1520"\w* \add day\add* of the \w week|strong="G4521"\w* let every \w one|strong="G1538"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w lay|strong="G5087"\w* \w by|strong="G3844"\w* \w him|strong="G1438"\w* in \w store|strong="G2343"\w*, \w as|strong="G3739"\w* \add God\add* hath prospered \w him|strong="G2137"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* there \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w gatherings|strong="G3048"\w* \w when|strong="G5119"\w* I \w come|strong="G2064"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* I \w come|strong="G3854"\w*, \w whomsoever|strong="G3739"\w* ye shall \w approve|strong="G1381"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \add your\add* \w letters|strong="G1992"\w*, \w them|strong="G5128"\w* will I \w send|strong="G3992"\w* to \w bring|strong="G0667"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w liberality|strong="G5485"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* it \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w meet|strong="G0514"\w* that I \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w also|strong="G2504"\w*, they shall \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* I will \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w when|strong="G3752"\w* I shall pass \w through|strong="G1330"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I do pass \w through|strong="G1330"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* it may be \w that|strong="G5177"\w* I will \w abide|strong="G3887"\w*, \w yea|strong="G2228"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w winter|strong="G3914"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* may \w bring|strong="G4311"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* on my \w journey|strong="G4311"\w* \w whithersoever|strong="G3757"\w* I \w go|strong="G4198"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w now|strong="G0737"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w way|strong="G3938"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* I \w trust|strong="G1679"\w* to \w tarry|strong="G1961"\w* a \w while|strong="G5550"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w permit|strong="G2010"\w*.
\w But|strong="G1161"\w* I will \w tarry|strong="G1961"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w* \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w Pentecost|strong="G4005"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w door|strong="G2374"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w effectual|strong="G1756"\w* is opened \w unto|strong="G0455"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add there are\add* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w adversaries|strong="G0480"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w Timotheus|strong="G5095"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, \w see|strong="G0991"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he may \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* without \w fear|strong="G0870"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he \w worketh|strong="G2038"\w* the \w work|strong="G2041"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \add do\add*.

\w Let|strong="G1848"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w despise|strong="G1848"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w conduct|strong="G4311"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w forth|strong="G4311"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he may \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I look \w for|strong="G1551"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*.

\w As|strong="G1161"\w* \w touching|strong="G4012"\w* \add our\add* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w Apollos|strong="G0625"\w*, \w I|strong="G3870"\w* \w greatly|strong="G4183"\w* \w desired|strong="G3870"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*: \w but|strong="G2532"\w* his \w will|strong="G2307"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* at \w all|strong="G3843"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* at this \w time|strong="G3568"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* he will \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* he shall have convenient \w time|strong="G2119"\w*.
Watch \w ye|strong="G1127"\w*, stand \w fast|strong="G4739"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, quit you like \w men|strong="G0407"\w*, be \w strong|strong="G2901"\w*.
\w Let|strong="G1096"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* be \w done|strong="G1096"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w charity|strong="G0026"\w*.

I \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, (ye \w know|strong="G1492"\w* the \w house|strong="G3614"\w* of \w Stephanas|strong="G4734"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w firstfruits|strong="G0536"\w* of \w Achaia|strong="G0882"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add that\add* they have \w addicted|strong="G5021"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w* of the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*,)

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* submit \w yourselves|strong="G5293"\w* unto \w such|strong="G5108"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to every \w one|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* helpeth \w with|strong="G4903"\w* \add us\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w laboureth|strong="G2872"\w*.

I am glad \w of|strong="G5463"\w* the \w coming|strong="G3952"\w* of \w Stephanas|strong="G4734"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Fortunatus|strong="G5415"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Achaicus|strong="G0883"\w*: for \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* was \w lacking|strong="G5303"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* your \w part|strong="G5216"\w* \w they|strong="G3778"\w* have \w supplied|strong="G0378"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* they have \w refreshed|strong="G0373"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w yours|strong="G5216"\w*: \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* acknowledge \w ye|strong="G1921"\w* them \w that|strong="G3588"\w* are \w such|strong="G5108"\w*.

The \w churches|strong="G1577"\w* of \w Asia|strong="G0773"\w* \w salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*. \w Aquila|strong="G0207"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Priscilla|strong="G4252"\w* \w salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w with|strong="G4862"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* that is \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*.

\w All|strong="G3956"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w greet|strong="G0782"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*. Greet \w ye|strong="G0782"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* an \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w kiss|strong="G5370"\w*.
The \w salutation|strong="G0783"\w* \w of|strong="G3972"\w* \add me\add* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* with mine \w own|strong="G1699"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w love|strong="G5368"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, let him \w be|strong="G2277"\w* \w Anathema|strong="G0331"\w* \w Maranatha|strong="G3134"\w*.
The \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of our \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*.

\w My|strong="G3450"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*. The first \add epistle\add* to the Corinthians was written from Philippi by Stephanas, and Fortunatus, and Achaicus, and Timotheus.
